00022 // SaveTemplate()
00023 // -- saves a template to the template file
00024 void TemplateArchive::SaveTemplate(TH1* hTemplate) {
00025 
00026   TDirectory* oldDir = TDirectory::CurrentDirectory(); // should be the directory we were already in
00027   if (hTemplate) {
00028     fTemplateFile->cd();
00029     hTemplate->Write();
00030   }
00031   oldDir->cd(); // go back to the old directory
00032 }
